metdetection.utils

Class MathUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • metdetection.utils.MathUtils

  • public class MathUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A static class of some utility functions that may need to used from multiple places.
    Author:
    Andrew McLeod

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private MathUtils()
      A private constructor since this class should never be instantiated.

    • Method Detail

      • gaussianWindow

        public static double gaussianWindow(double mean1,
                    double mean2,
                    double std)
        Evaluate a Gaussian window function with the given mean range and standard deviation. The formula is: G(m1, m2, s) = e ^ [(-1 / 2) * ([m2 - m1] / s) ^ 2]
        Parameters:
        mean1 - The low end of the mean range.
        mean2 - The high end of the mean range.
        std - The standard deviation.
        Returns:
        The value of the Gaussian window function.

      • getMaxIndex

        public static int getMaxIndex(double[] array)
        Get the index of the first occurrence of the maximum value in the given array.
        Parameters:
        array - The array whose max we will find.
        Returns:
        The index of the first occurrence of the maximum value of the given array. Or, -1 if the maximum vlaue is Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY or the array has length 0.

      • getGCF

        public static int getGCF(int a,
         int b)
        Get the greatest common factor of two integers.
        Parameters:
        a - The first integer.
        b - The second integer.
        Returns:
        Their greatest common factor.
